sentences.sentence: What do we know about the book A Moveable Feast?
sentences.translation: 关于《流动的盛宴》这本书，我们知道些什么？

sentences.sentence: There are three books I reread annually. The first, which I take to reading every spring is Emest Hemningway's A Moveable Feast.
sentences.translation: 每年我都会重读三本书。第一本是埃姆斯特·海明威的《流动的盛宴》，我每年春天都会读它。

sentences.sentence: In college, when I created my online dating (约会) profile, in the "favorite books" section I put One Hundred Years of Solitude, A Moveable Feast, White Fang and so on.
sentences.translation: 大学的时候，我创建了我的网上约会资料页，“最喜欢的书”一栏中我把《百年孤独》、《流动的盛宴》、《白牙》等等都填了上去。
